en: He was poor and could not buy it.
He is not ashamed of being poor.
He's poor, but he's honest.
He is poor, but he is in high spirits.
zh: 他很穷，但是他精神很好。

en: He is poor.
He went to the beach, and looked far across the sea toward the horizon.
zh: 他去了海滩，远远地望着海平线。

en: He is a common sort of man.
He lived a moral life.
He watched with the patient.
He acted as if he were ill.
I am concerned about his poor health.
He is handicapped by poor health.
zh: 他因身体不好而受到阻碍。

en: He resigned on the grounds that he was ill.
He resigned on the grounds of ill health.
zh: 他因健康不佳而辞职了。

en: He's still in poor health after his illness.
He seemed to have been ill.
He is suffering from an aggravated disease.
zh: 他正遭受着一种恶化的疾病。

en: He seems to be sick.
He seems to be ill.
He seems ill.
He comes to see his sick friend day after day.
zh: 他日复一日地来看望他生病的朋友。

en: He showed great courage during his illness.
zh: 他在生病期间表现出了极大的勇气。

en: It seemed that he was sick.
It looks as if he were sick.
He cannot be ill.
He resigned his post on account of illness.
He was absent owing to illness.
On account of illness he absented himself from school.
He could not come because he was ill.
He could not take examination on account of his illness.
He could not join us because he was ill.
zh: 他因为生病没能参加我们的聚会。

en: He was absent because of illness.
He was absent from school because he was sick.
He was absent from school because of illness.
He could not go on the hike because he was ill.
zh: 他因为生病没能去徒步旅行。

en: He could not attend the party because of illness.
zh: 他因为生病没能参加聚会。

en: He must be sick; he looks pale.
zh: 他一定是病了，脸色苍白。

en: He often gets sick.
He attended the meeting in spite of illness.
zh: 他不顾生病参加了会议。

en: He is afraid of becoming sick.
He looks as if he is going to be ill.
zh: 他看起来好像要生病了。

en: He fell ill, and therefore he gave up going abroad.
zh: 他生病了，所以放弃了出国。

en: He became sick. That's why he gave up going abroad.
zh: 他生病了，所以放弃了出国。

en: He was taken ill.
He's pale because he's sick.
zh: 他脸色苍白，因为他病了。

en: I wonder if he's really sick.
zh: 我不知道他是不是真的病了。

en: He is sick and should be treated as such.
It is probable that he is ill.
He thinks nothing of his illness.
He quit the company on the grounds that he was ill.
He cannot come, he is ill.
Because he's sick, he can't come.
zh: 因为他病了，所以他来不了。

en: He was wasted away by illness.
zh: 他被疾病折磨得憔悴不堪。

en: He couldn't come because he was sick.
He could not come on account of his illness.
He was sick, so he couldn't come.
It's a pity that he should be ill in bed.
zh: 他生病卧床真是太可惜了。

en: I am told that he is ill in bed.
He may be sick in bed.
He remains sick in bed.
He is absent because of illness.
He's absent due to his sickness.
He was absent from school on account of illness.
He is confined to his house by illness.
I suspect he is ill.
He has been confined to his bed with illness.
He is sick.
He is ill. That is why he is not here.
zh: 他病了。这就是他没来的原因。

en: He looks as if he had been ill.
It seemed that he had been ill.
He can't have been ill.
He said he was sick, which was a lie.
I hear he is ill.
He was ill, so he couldn't come.
He was ill, and so they were quiet.
zh: 他病了，所以他们都很安静。

en: He was ill, so he lay in bed all day long.
zh: 他病了，所以整天躺在床上。

en: He went to work in spite of his illness.
He may have been ill.
He was sick, so he did not go out.
zh: 他生病了，所以没有出门。

en: I'm afraid he is ill.
It is said that he is sick.
He built hospitals and helped the people of Africa improve their lives.
zh: 他建造医院，帮助非洲人民改善生活。

en: Hardly had he arrived at the hospital when he breathed his last.
He's in charge of administration at the hospital.
zh: 他负责医院的行政管理。

en: He wants to work in a hospital.
He regained consciousness in the hospital.
zh: 他在医院里恢复了意识。

en: He became more and more famous as a critic.
zh: 作为评论家，他越来越出名。

en: He is a man of good reputation.
He has a good reputation.
He appears sly on the surface.
zh: 他表面上看起来很狡猾。

en: He filed the surface smooth.
He made a house on the ice.
zh: 他在冰上盖了一间房子。

en: He fell down on the ice and hurt his leg.
zh: 他在冰上摔倒了，伤了腿。

en: He fell down on the ice and broke his arm.
zh: 他在冰上摔倒了，摔断了胳膊。

en: He slipped on the ice.
He made believe that he was a millionaire.
zh: 他假装自己是个百万富翁。

en: He had no more than one hundred yen with him.
He had only one hundred yen on him.
He had only one hundred yen with him.
He is a good correspondent.
zh: 他是一个优秀的通信员。

en: He earns his bread by writing.
He has more money than is needed.
He asked me for more money than was necessary.
zh: 他向我要的钱超过了必要的数额。

en: He said that necessity is the mother of invention.
He had complete mastery over the necessary mathematics formula.
zh: 他完全掌握了必要的数学公式。

en: He ran for his life.
He never fails to keep his word with his friends.
He was always true to his promises.
He can not fail to keep his promise.
He always keeps appointments.
He always keeps his promises.
He never failed to keep his promise.
He is sure to accomplish his purpose.
zh: 他一定会实现他的目标。

en: He never fails to give her a birthday present.
zh: 他从不忘记给她送生日礼物。

en: He is a natural to win the Presidency.
He always took a seat in the front row.
He will succeed without fail.
He is sure to succeed.
He'll be sure to get on in life.
It is certain that he'll win the game.
He is sure to pass the exam.
He will scold us no matter what.
zh: 无论如何他都会责骂我们。

en: He is sure to come to see us.
He never fails write to his parents once a month.
zh: 他每月都一定会给父母写信。

en: He'll come to see me without fail.
He never fails to write to his parents once a month.
zh: 他总是每月给父母写信。

en: He will never fail to carry out the project.
zh: 他一定会完成这个项目。

en: He is bound to solve this question.
zh: 他肯定能解决这个问题。

en: He makes a point of taking the eight o'clock bus.
zh: 他总是特意赶八点的公共汽车。

en: He never fails to come here at three.
He was knee deep in mud.
zh: 他陷在泥里，泥没过了膝盖。

en: He decided to play it safe and pull out of the tournament due to his injured knee.
zh: 他决定稳妥起见，退出比赛，因为他的膝盖受伤了。

en: His nose bled.
He has a long nose.
His nose is his best feature.
zh: 他的鼻子是他最好看的特征。

en: He is a man of virtue.
He teaches arts and crafts in a school.
zh: 他在学校教美术和工艺。

en: He was tired from walking round museums.
He has a fine library of books on art.
zh: 他有一个藏书丰富的艺术图书馆。

en: Love for art carried him abroad.
zh: 对艺术的热爱促使他出国。

en: He had a good fortune to marry a beautiful girl.
zh: 他很幸运娶了一个漂亮的女孩。

en: He frowned and turned away.
He smiled and said goodbye.
He hid his sadness behind a smile.
zh: 他把悲伤藏在笑容背后。

en: He smiled and left.
He disguised his sorrow with a smile.
zh: 他用微笑掩饰了他的悲伤。

en: He likes air travel.
He survived the plane crash.
zh: 他在飞机坠毁中幸存下来。

en: He was killed in an airplane accident.
zh: 他在一次飞机事故中丧生。

en: He survived the crash, only to die in the desert.
zh: 他从坠机中幸存下来，却死在了沙漠里。

en: He bought a plane ticket.
He looked back at me before he went on board the plane.
zh: 他在登上飞机前回头看了我一眼。

en: He may have missed the plane.
He lived in the days when air travel was considered dangerous.
zh: 他生活在人们认为航空旅行很危险的年代。

en: He doesn't like traveling by air.
He went from Tokyo to Osaka by plane.
zh: 他乘飞机从东京到大阪。

en: He flew from London to Paris.
He flew to Paris.
He hates air travel.
He likes travelling abroad by air.
zh: 他喜欢乘飞机出国旅行。

en: He nods and shakes the spheres.
zh: 他点头并摇晃着这些球体。

en: He was bursting with energy.
He was as gentle a man as ever lived.
zh: 他是一个非常温柔的人。

en: He jumped on.
He is endowed with unusual ability in mathematics.
zh: 他天生具有非凡的数学能力。

en: He stood tall even under criticism.
zh: 即使在批评之下，他仍然站得很直。

en: He is devoid of common sense.
He lacks common sense.
He doesn't have any common sense.
He pushed the emergency button.
He was greatly praised, while I was as much scolded.
zh: 他受到了极大的赞扬，而我却受到了严厉的斥责。

en: He is a man of great ability.
zh: 他是一个很有能力的人。

en: He is a very forgetful fellow.
zh: 他是一个非常健忘的人。

en: He catches cold very easily.
He catches colds very easily.
He is such a careless boy that he often makes mistakes.
zh: 他真是个粗心的男孩，经常犯错。

en: He is such a careless boy that he makes mistakes very often.
zh: 他真是个粗心的男孩，经常犯错。

en: He is so careless that he often makes mistakes.
He is said to be very poor.
He sang the song with great expression.
zh: 他充满感情地唱了这首歌。

en: He likes a most beautiful flower.
zh: 他喜欢一朵非常漂亮的花。

en: He was so tired that he laid himself on the grass.
zh: 他太累了，就躺在了草地上。

en: He was too tired to go any farther.
He is extremely pessimistic and has no aspirations.
zh: 他非常悲观，没有任何抱负。

en: He was very old and ill.
zh: 他年纪很大，而且病得很重。

en: He is active although he is very old.
zh: 他虽然年纪很大，但仍然很活跃。

en: Even though he's very old, he's healthy.
zh: 即使他年纪很大，他也很健康。

en: He worked so hard that he succeeded.
zh: 他努力工作，所以成功了。

en: He was so angry, he was red in the face.
zh: 他非常生气，气得满脸通红。

en: He is a man of great knowledge, that is to say, a walking dictionary.
zh: 他是一个知识渊博的人，也就是说，他简直就是一本活字典。

en: He spends a great deal of money on books.
He was greatly respected; while his son was as much despised.
zh: 他备受尊敬，而他的儿子却被人鄙视。

en: So fast did he run that they couldn't catch up with him.
zh: 他跑得太快了，以至于他们追不上他。

en: He ran so fast that they couldn't catch up with him.
zh: 他跑得太快了，他们追不上他。

en: Since he ran so fast, they couldn't catch up with him.
zh: 因为他跑得太快，他们追不上他。

en: They couldn't catch up with him because he ran so fast.
zh: 他们追不上他，因为他跑得太快了。

en: He is a very imaginative writer.
zh: 他是一位非常有想象力的作家。

en: He is so honest that everybody trusts him.
zh: 他非常诚实，所以每个人都信任他。

en: He is so honest that he is trusted by everyone.
zh: 他非常诚实，所以他被大家信任。

en: His honesty was such that he was respected by everybody.
zh: 他的诚实使他受到大家的尊敬。

en: He was too drunk to drive home.
zh: 他喝得太醉了，没法开车回家。

en: Since he was very drunk, he couldn't drive his car home.
zh: 因为他喝得很醉，所以他没法开车回家。

en: He was too feeble to do manual labor.
zh: 他太虚弱了，干不了体力活。

en: He is a very decent fellow.
He is very kind.
He is all nerves.
He achieved great success in life.
zh: 他一生取得了巨大的成功。

en: He is a very important person.
zh: 他是个非常重要的人物。

en: He is too wise not to know that.
zh: 他很聪明，不可能不知道这件事。

en: He is very strong--so much so that no one can defeat him.
zh: 他非常强壮，以至于没有人能打败他。

en: He is very learned.
He has increased his proficiency in English greatly.
zh: 他的英语水平大大提高了。

en: He is such a tidy person. Every pot and pan is in its place.
zh: 他是个非常整洁的人。所有的锅碗瓢盆都摆放得井井有条。

en: He was so confused that his answer did not make any sense.
zh: 他太糊涂了，以至于他的回答毫无意义。

en: He glared at me fiercely.
He showed courage in the face of great danger.
zh: 他在巨大的危险面前表现出了勇气。

en: He left cost out of account.
zh: 他没有把成本考虑进去。

en: He exaggerates the harm done.
He was well built, if not fat as such.
zh: 他身材魁梧，即使不是真的胖。

en: He is overweight.
He didn't reveal his secret.
It is said that he knows the secret.
It's said that he knows the secret.
They say that he knows the secret.
zh: 他们说他知道这个秘密。

en: He had kept the secret to himself.
zh: 他一直把这个秘密藏在心里。

en: He knows the secret.
He found out the secret.
He tried to keep the secret back from us.
zh: 他试图对我们隐瞒这个秘密。

en: He is the last person to give away the secret.
He dismissed his secretary, who was very idle.
zh: 他解雇了他的秘书，因为她非常懒惰。

en: He let his secretary go.
He had his secretary type letter.
He had his secretary translate the letter into English.
zh: 他让他的秘书把信翻译成英文。

en: He had his secretary make another copy.
zh: 他让他的秘书再复印一份。

en: He had to part with his secretary when she got married.
zh: 他的秘书结婚时，他不得不和她分别。

en: He laid bare his secret feelings.
zh: 他袒露了他内心深处的秘密情感。

en: He has given out.
He seems tired.
He looks tired.
He was too tired to walk any more.
He is tired, and so am I.
Since he was tired, he turned in earlier than usual.
zh: 因为他很累，所以他比平时睡得早。

en: Since he was tired, he was sitting on the sofa with his eyes closed.
zh: 因为他很累，所以他闭着眼睛坐在沙发上。

en: Tired as he was, he went to bed early.
zh: 虽然他很累，但他还是早早睡了。

en: Since he was tired, he went to bed early.
zh: 因为他很累，所以他早早睡了。

en: He was tired, so he went to bed early.
zh: 他很累，所以他早早睡了。

en: He was tired but worked.
Even though he was tired, he worked.
zh: 即使他很累，他还是工作了。

en: Although he was tired, he would not stop working.
zh: 尽管他很累，他还是不停地工作。

en: Tired as he was, he went on working.
zh: 虽然他很累，但他还是继续工作。

en: He was tired, but he kept working.
zh: 他很累，但他还是继续工作。

en: He carried on with his work although he was tired.
zh: 虽然他很累，但他还是继续工作。

en: He was tired, and yet he went to help them.
zh: 他很累，但他还是去帮助他们。

en: He rested his tired limbs.
He leaned against the wall as he was tired.
zh: 他因为疲惫而靠在墙上。

en: He is too tired to study.
He is too tired to go any farther.
He is very sensitive to criticism.
He knows that his critics are waiting to pounce on any slip that he makes.
zh: 他知道批评他的人正等着抓住他的任何失误。

en: He is sensitive to criticism.
He cried out and ran away.
He was blind with sorrow.
He was heartbroken and hanged himself.
He abandoned himself to grief.
He was heartbroken.
His cup of misery was full.
He has a tendency to be pessimistic.
His heart is broken.
He was beside himself with grief.
He answered with a sad air.
zh: 他带着悲伤的神情回答。

en: He walked away with a sad look on his face.
zh: 他带着悲伤的表情走开了。

en: He has a wistful look on his face.
zh: 他脸上带着渴望的神情。

en: He died a sad death.
He grumbled about the way they treated him.
zh: 他抱怨他们对待他的方式。

en: He deceived her, but even now she loves him.
zh: 他欺骗了她，但即使现在她仍然爱着他。

en: He took her aside and told her the news.
zh: 他把她拉到一旁，告诉了她这个消息。

en: He brought her to our place.
zh: 他把她带到我们这儿来了。

en: He could not but admire her.
He suddenly tightened his arm around her.
zh: 他突然紧紧地搂住了她。

en: He insulted her. That is why she got angry.
zh: 他侮辱了她。这就是她生气的原因。

en: He made her his secretary.
He went so far as to call her a fool.
He apologized for having offended her.
He said nothing that would make her angry.
zh: 他没说任何会让她生气的话。

en: He engaged her as an interpreter.
He proposed asking her to lunch.
zh: 他提议邀请她共进午餐。

en: He will be waiting for her.
He tried to persuade her in vain.
zh: 他试图说服她，但徒劳无功。

en: He tried to persuade her.
He reasoned her into believing what he said.
zh: 他说理说得她相信了他的话。

en: He loves her dearly.
He did his best to help her.
He helps her.
He ran across the street, leaving her alone.
zh: 他穿过马路跑了，把她一个人留下了。

en: He made her his wife.
He hates her.
He made her happy.
He went to the airport to see her off.
He has been to the station to see her off.
He risked his life to save her.
zh: 他冒着生命危险救了她。

en: He characterized her as lively.
He invited her to go to the concert.
He went so far as to hit her.
He slapped her.
Does he need to help her?
He accused her of having lied to him.
He tried to comfort her, but she kept crying.
zh: 他试图安慰她，但她一直在哭。

en: He set her mind at rest.
He lured her with trinkets.
He loves her, but she doesn't like him.
He loves her. She loves him, too.
He boosted her into the job.
zh: 他帮助她得到了那份工作。

en: He handed her up into the bus.
He swindled her.
He called her bad names.
He took her out for a drive.
He thought her very charming.
He glanced at her and saw she was angry.
zh: 他看了她一眼，发现她很生气。

en: He glanced at her.
He tricked her into agreeing to his proposal.
zh: 他欺骗她同意了他的求婚。

en: He deceived her into buying a precious jewel.
zh: 他欺骗她买了一颗珍贵的宝石。

en: He cheated her into believing it was true.
zh: 他欺骗她相信那是真的。

en: He fixed his eyes on her.
He held her tightly.
He browbeat her into accepting it.
He scolded her.
He has her on a pedestal.
He is beneath her in rank.
He is older than she is by three years.
He's three years older than she is.
He's three years older than her.
He doesn't have as many books as she does.
He caught her by the arm.
He seized her hand and dragged her away.
zh: 他抓住她的手，把她拖走了。

en: He grabbed her arm.
He did not like her manner of speech.
zh: 他不喜欢她的说话方式。

en: He doubted the truth of her story.
zh: 他怀疑她故事的真实性。

en: He sat next to her.
He took her by the upper parts of her arms.
He flatly refused her requests for help.
zh: 他断然拒绝了她寻求帮助的请求。

en: He made no mention of her request.
He told her firmly to realize how serious her condition was.
zh: 他严肃地告诉她要意识到她的病情有多严重。

en: He's her friend.
He is her friend.
He looked into her eyes and suddenly went away.
zh: 他看着她的眼睛，突然走开了。

en: He looked her right in the eye.
He said so to her face.
Her name was often on his lips.
zh: 他的嘴边经常提到她的名字。

en: He glanced at her name tag.
He held her daughter dear.
He was deceived by her innocent appearance.
zh: 他被她天真无邪的外表欺骗了。

en: He is displeased at her rude behavior.
zh: 他对她粗鲁的行为感到不满。

en: He fell captive to her charms.
He was married to her sister.
He walked up to her.
He turned out her father.
He turned out to be her father.
zh: 结果证明他是她的父亲。

en: It turned out that he was her father.
zh: 结果发现他是她的父亲。

en: We found out that he was her father.
zh: 我们发现他是她的父亲。

en: He chided her for her unfaithfulness.
He talked about her illness.
He is enamored of her beauty.
He praised her beauty and her singing.
zh: 他赞美了她的美貌和歌声。

en: He betrayed her secret to his friends.
zh: 他向朋友们泄露了她的秘密。

en: He was curious to know her secret.
zh: 他很好奇想知道她的秘密。

en: He sank the knife into her back.
zh: 他把刀插进了她的后背。

en: He yielded to her ardent wishes.
zh: 他屈服于她热切的愿望。

en: He was the agent of her despair.
He is impatient for her arrival.
zh: 他急切地等待她的到来。

en: He was conscious of her presence.
He held her by the sleeve.
He collapsed at her feet.
He spoke well of her son.
He was cowed by her intelligence.
He put on airs in her presence.
He detected in her voice a note of apprehension.
zh: 他听出她的声音里带着一丝忧虑。

en: He rejoiced at her success.
zh: 他为她的成功感到高兴。

en: He expressed his belief in her honesty.
zh: 他表达了他对她诚实的信任。

en: He was envious of her way of living.
He made nothing of her success.
zh: 他认为她的成功没什么大不了的。

en: He traded on her kindness.
He responded to her offer with a laugh.
zh: 他以一笑回应了她的提议。

en: He was very hurt by her cruel words.
zh: 他被她残酷的话语深深伤害了。

en: He dropped her a line.
He could not help laughing at her jokes.
zh: 他忍不住被她的笑话逗乐了。

en: He didn't get her joke.
He was attracted by her smile.
He ignored her advice.
He ran up to her.
He said that if he knew her address, he would write to her.
zh: 他说如果他知道她的地址，他就会给她写信。

en: He was not at all surprised at her ability.
zh: 他对她的能力一点也不感到惊讶。

en: He ripped up all her letters and photos.
zh: 他撕毁了她所有的信件和照片。

en: He carried her luggage to the train.
zh: 他把她的行李搬到了火车上。

en: He took her by the hand.
He caught her hand.
He scolded her for her weakness.
zh: 他因为她的软弱而责骂她。

en: He got away with her watch.
zh: 他偷了她的手表逃走了。

en: He's not serious about her at all - he's just playing with her.
zh: 他对她一点也不认真——他只是在玩弄她。

en: He intruded on her privacy.
He is holding up her work.
He was ready to help her with dish-washing.
He stole money from her wallet.
He is jealous of her talent.
He put his arm around her waist.
He did all he could to win her favor.
zh: 他竭尽所能地博取她的好感。

en: He crossed her old telephone number off.
zh: 他把她旧的电话号码划掉了。

en: He besought her to favor him.
He could not help getting angry at her words.
zh: 他忍不住对她的话感到生气。

en: He took her remarks as flattery.
He was angry at her words.
He was angry because of what she said.
zh: 他因为她说的话而生气。

en: What she said made him angry.
Her words angered him.
He concentrated his attention on what she said.
zh: 他集中注意力听她说话。

en: He was angry at what she said.
zh: 他因为她说的话而生气。

en: She has him wrapped around her finger.
zh: 她把他玩弄于股掌之中。

en: He touched her on the shoulder.
He put his arm around her shoulders.
He put a hand gently on her shoulder.
zh: 他轻轻地把一只手放在她的肩膀上。

en: He is anxious about her health.
He longed for her talented skills.
zh: 他渴望她有才华的技能。

en: He stood close to her and tried to protect her from the typhoon.
zh: 他靠近她站着，试图保护她免受台风的侵袭。

en: He tried to attract her attention.
He stared her in the face.
He kept his eyes fixed on her face.
He trampled on her feelings.
He was afraid that he might hurt her feelings.
zh: 他害怕他可能会伤害她的感情。

en: He walked to and fro in front of her house.
zh: 他在她家门前来回踱步。

en: He seated himself beside her.
He cried in admiration of her performance.
zh: 他赞赏她的表演，感动得哭了。

en: He cursed her fate.
He adopted her idea.
He tried to gain her affection.
He won her affection.
He was overwhelmed by the intensity of her love.
zh: 他被她浓烈的爱意所淹没。

en: He gained her affections.
He tried to kill himself because he lost her love.
zh: 他因为失去了她的爱而试图自杀。

en: He kissed her on the cheek.
He is anxious for her news.
zh: 他焦急地等待她的消息。

en: He was impatient with her unfriendly attitude.
zh: 他对她不友好的态度感到不耐烦。

en: He went so far as to say that she was stupid.
He lay awake for hours thinking about her.
zh: 他躺在床上好几个小时睡不着，想着她。

en: He can't take his eyes off her.
He is in a rage with her.
He's very angry with her.
He selected a Christmas gift for her.
zh: 他为她挑选了一件圣诞礼物。

en: He was deceived by her apparent friendliness.
zh: 他被她表面上的友好所欺骗。

en: He acts very shy in her presence.
zh: 他在她面前表现得很害羞。

en: He grasped her meaning clearly.
zh: 他清楚地理解了她的意思。

en: He is good at imitating her Irish accent.
zh: 他很擅长模仿她的爱尔兰口音。

en: He is in love with her, but he tries to conceal his feelings.
zh: 他爱着她，但他试图隐藏自己的感情。

en: He is in love with her.
He loves her.
He is not less diligent than she.
He is no less qualified for the job than she is.
zh: 他胜任这份工作不亚于她。

en: He nodded to her to come along.
zh: 他朝她点点头，示意她跟上。

en: He gave her a fond look.
He made her a bookshelf.
He gave her a book.
He is prejudiced against her.
He took offence at her.
He bought a dress for her.
He made her clean the room.
He revealed the secret to her.
He meets his girlfriend Saturdays.
zh: 他星期六和他女朋友见面。

en: He meets his girlfriend on Saturdays.
zh: 他星期六和他女朋友见面。

en: He was to have called her up, but he forgot.
zh: 他本应该给她打电话的，但他忘了。

en: He pointed out some spelling errors to her.
zh: 他向她指出了一些拼写错误。

en: He walked as fast as he could to catch up with her.
zh: 他尽可能快地走，以便赶上她。

en: He wrote her a long letter, which he didn't mail.
zh: 他给她写了一封很长的信，但他没有寄出去。

en: He urged her to drive carefully.
He apologized to her for being late.
He was humiliated by her.
He gave her a nice present.
zh: 他给了她一份精美的礼物。

en: He didn't press her for an explanation.
He fell in love with her at first sight.
He is not kind to her.
Is he nice to her?
He is kind to her.
He made her a new coat.
zh: 他给她做了一件新外套。

en: He said to her under his breath.
He said to her under his breath, "I love you."
zh: 他小声地对她说：“我爱你。”

en: He neglected to write her.
He gave her a warning against driving too fast.
He asked her if she knew him.
He acquainted her with his plan.
zh: 他向她介绍了他的计划。

en: He told her about his plan.
zh: 他告诉她关于他的计划。

en: He gave her a piece of paper.
He waits on her.
He didn't try to answer her back.
He gave her an engagement ring last night.
zh: 他昨晚给了她一枚订婚戒指。

en: He made advances to her.
He knows her by sight.
He bought her a dog.
He asked her to marry him, which proposal she refused.
zh: 他向她求婚，但她拒绝了。

en: He asked her to marry him, and she accepted.
He asked her to marry him, but she refused.
zh: 他向她求婚，但她拒绝了。

en: He asked her to marry him and she accepted his proposal.
zh: 他向她求婚，她接受了他的求婚。

en: He told her that she was right.
He required her to explain how she spent money.
zh: 他要求她解释她是如何花钱的。

en: He went up to her and they shook hands.
zh: 他走到她面前，他们握了握手。

en: "Val!" he shouted when he recognized her.
He shouted to her to be careful.
He couldn't convince her of her mistake.
zh: 他说服不了她承认错误。

en: He said that he had met her, which was a lie.
zh: 他说他见过她，这是个谎言。

en: He denied having met her.
His one thought is to see her.
zh: 他唯一的想法就是见到她。

en: All he is thinking about is meeting her.
zh: 他满脑子想的都是见到她。

en: The only thing he's thinking about is seeing her.
zh: 他唯一想的就是见到她。

en: He was all eagerness to see her.
zh: 他迫不及待地想见到她。

en: He picked flowers for her.
He whispered something to her.
zh: 他悄悄地对她说了些什么。

en: He bade her adieu forever.
He advised her to stop drinking.
He called her every other day.
zh: 他隔一天就给她打电话。

en: He remembers meeting her once.
He gave her a piece of advice.
He was urgent in insisting that she call the doctor.
zh: 他极力坚持让她打电话给医生。

en: He told her that he loved her.
He's deeply attached to her.
He forgot buying a present for her.
He forgot that he bought her a present.
zh: 他忘了他给她买了礼物。

en: He went to the length of saying that he would never speak to her again.
zh: 他甚至说他再也不会和她说话了。

en: He asked her why she was crying.
He is very friendly to her.
He will make her a good husband.
He asked her where she lived.
He is particularly kind to her.
He took back what he had said about her.
zh: 他收回了他对她说过的话。

en: He bought her some chocolates.
zh: 他给她买了一些巧克力。

en: It was she who made him do it.
He was shown the photo by her.
zh: 他被她展示了那张照片。

en: He bought her a sweater.
He is deeply attached to her.
He ran past without noticing her.
zh: 他跑过去了，没有注意到她。

en: He stole a kiss from her.
He gave her a considerable sum of money.
He was asked to give her some money.
He bothered her with questions.
He asked her to stay, but she didn't want to.
He asked her some questions.
He isn't good enough for her.
He asked her if she was Jane.
He would not speak to her again.
zh: 他再也不会和她说话了。

en: He was determined never to meet her again.
zh: 他决心再也不要见到她。

en: He said that he had met her a week before.
He asked her where her mother was.
He asked her to call him later.
zh: 他让她晚点给他打电话。

en: He suggested to her that she should buy it.
He knows better than to argue with her.
zh: 他知道和她争论是不明智的。

en: He fell in love with her.
He couldn't bear to be apart from her.
He can't swim like she can.
He is no less diligent than she.
He is as tall as her.
He is as tall as she.
He made a bet with her.
He came to terms with her.
He was not able to marry her.
He denied having met her last week.
He is a distant relation of hers.
He is close with her.
He is on friendly terms with her.
He was unable to completely give up on his hopes of marrying her.
zh: 他始终无法完全放弃娶她的希望。

en: He promised to marry her.
He knows better than to marry her.
He persisted in marrying her.
He intended to marry her.
He made up his mind to marry her.
He decided to marry her.
He thought better of marrying her.
He made it plain that he wanted to marry her.
He went along with her.
He went together with her.
He is distantly related to her.
He shook hands with her and smiled.
zh: 他和她握了握手，笑了笑。

en: He announced his engagement to her.
He stays in touch with her.
He wants to go out with her.
He had a good time talking with her.
zh: 他和她聊天聊得很愉快。

en: He is anxious for her to come.
He convinced us of her innocence.
zh: 他说服我们相信她是无辜的。

en: He stepped aside for her to enter the room.
He had a notion that she was very angry with him.
zh: 他觉得她对他非常生气。

en: He noticed her embarrassment.
He didn't tell the truth for fear she should get angry.
zh: 他没有说实话，怕她生气。

en: He resented that she was dating his brother.
zh: 他很反感她和他的兄弟约会。

en: He knew she had been busy since morning.
zh: 他知道她从早上就一直很忙。

en: He was irritated by her delay.
He watched her making a doll.
He came to like her.
He blamed her for imagining that she was sick.
zh: 他责怪她想象自己生病了。

en: He affirmed the truth of her statement.
zh: 他肯定了她陈述的真实性。

en: He paid no attention to what she said.
zh: 他没有注意她说了什么。

en: He yearned for her to come home.
He does not seem to be able to catch on to what she is saying.
zh: 他似乎听不懂她在说什么。

en: He knew that she had been ill in bed for a week.
zh: 他知道她已经卧病在床一个星期了。

en: He is bound to her.
He stood aloof from her.
He regretted having borrowed that book from her.
zh: 他后悔向她借了那本书。

en: He got no answer from her.
He would wait for hours for her call.
zh: 他会等她几个小时的电话。

en: He extorted a large amount of money from her.
zh: 他从她那里敲诈了一大笔钱。

en: He accepted her gift.
He angrily tore up the letter from her.
zh: 他生气地撕毁了她的来信。

en: He regretted borrowing the book from her.
zh: 他后悔从她那里借了书。

en: He waited until she came.
He is bound to pass the entrance examination.
zh: 他肯定能通过入学考试。

en: He wondered why she did not come.
zh: 他想知道她为什么没来。

en: He wondered why she did that.
zh: 他想知道她为什么那样做。

en: He was persuaded into doing it against his own wishes.
zh: 他被人说服做了他不愿意做的事。

en: He admonished them for being noisy.
He chastised them for being noisy.
He will not help them, nor will I.
zh: 他不会帮助他们，我也不会。

en: He kept an eye on them.
He is cleverer than they are.
He's smarter than they are.
He's smarter than them.
He's brighter than they are.
He is the oldest of them all.
zh: 他是他们当中年龄最大的。

en: He turned a deaf ear to their request.
zh: 他对他们的请求置若罔闻。

en: He turned a deaf ear to their complaints.
zh: 他对他们的抱怨置若罔闻。

en: He was angered by the murder of their comrades.
zh: 他们的同志被谋杀激怒了他。

en: He will reconcile their dispute.
He did not accept their invitation.
zh: 他没有接受他们的邀请。

en: He is displeased with their way of reception.
zh: 他对他们的接待方式感到不满。

en: He is looked up to as their leader.
zh: 他被他们视为领袖，备受尊敬。

en: He was respected as their teacher.
zh: 他作为他们的老师，备受尊敬。

en: He is furious at what they have done to him.
zh: 他对他们对他所做的事情感到愤怒。

en: He said that their principal would go there the next day.
zh: 他说他们的校长第二天会去那里。

en: He was jealous of their happiness.
He had to submit himself to their decision.
zh: 他不得不服从他们的决定。

en: He tried in vain to put an end to their heated discussion.
zh: 他试图阻止他们激烈的讨论，但徒劳无功。

en: He contemplated their plan.
zh: 他仔细考虑了他们的计划。

en: He denied knowing anything of their plan.
zh: 他否认知道他们的任何计划。

en: He was looked up to as their leader.
zh: 他被他们视为领袖，备受尊敬。

en: He was incensed by their lack of incentives.
zh: 他因他们缺乏激励措施而感到愤怒。

en: He is the only child they have.
He tried to put an end to their quarrel.
zh: 他试图结束他们的争吵。

en: He avenged his friend on them.
zh: 他为他的朋友向他们报了仇。

en: He conceived a deep hatred for them.
zh: 他对他们产生了深深的仇恨。

en: He is respected by them.
He taught them how to sail ships.
zh: 他教他们如何驾驶船只。

en: He was kindness itself to them.
He provided them with food.
He supplied food and money to them.
zh: 他向他们提供了食物和金钱。

en: He ordered them to release the prisoners.
He ordered them to release the prisoner.
He tried in vain to convince them of his innocence.
zh: 他试图说服他们相信他的清白，但徒劳无功。

en: He tried to convince them of his innocence in vain.
zh: 他试图说服他们相信他的清白，但徒劳无功。

en: He stressed that they must arrive punctually.
zh: 他强调他们必须准时到达。

en: He hid in the bushes so that they would not see him.
zh: 他藏在灌木丛里，这样他们就看不见他了。

en: He was very kind to them.
He said he would give a helping hand to them.
He proposed that they stay at that inn.
zh: 他提议他们住在那家旅馆。

en: He refused to give them the information.
He was made to tell them everything.
He made a bargain with them about the furniture.
zh: 他和他们就家具达成了一项交易。

en: He made a clean break with them.
He thought of them yearning for fame.
He tried to borrow a large sum of money from them in vain.
zh: 他试图向他们借一大笔钱，但没有成功。

en: He was proud of his punctuality.
zh: 他为他的准时感到自豪。

en: He is sensible of the danger of his position.
zh: 他意识到自己处境的危险。

en: He applied his theory to his case.
zh: 他把他的理论应用到他的案例中。

en: He maintained that his theory was true of this case.
zh: 他坚持认为他的理论适用于这个案例。

en: He is respected by his friends.
He rescued the little girl at the cost of his life.
zh: 他以生命为代价救出了那个小女孩。

en: He was happy to realize his dream.
zh: 他很高兴实现他的梦想。

en: He went to meet Pizzaro and twenty of his men.
zh: 他去见了皮萨罗和他的二十个手下。

en: He is playing in his room.
He resembles his father in his way of talking.
zh: 他说话的方式像他的父亲。

en: He is less impatient than his father.
zh: 他比他的父亲少些不耐烦。

en: He succeeded to his father's estate.
zh: 他继承了他父亲的遗产。

en: He succeeded to his father's property.
zh: 他继承了他父亲的财产。

en: He had to part with his secretary because she got married.
zh: 他不得不和他的秘书分开，因为她结婚了。

en: He had to let his secretary go because she got married.
zh: 他不得不解雇他的秘书，因为她结婚了。

en: He congratulates himself on his foresight.
zh: 他为自己的远见卓识感到自豪。

en: He was profuse in his praise of his teacher.
zh: 他对他的老师赞不绝口。

en: He had great influence on those around him.
zh: 他对周围的人有很大的影响力。

en: He showed his photograph album to me.
He was one of the famous men of letters in his era.
zh: 他是他那个时代著名的文学家之一。

en: He was ahead of his time.
He started his job in his early forties.
zh: 他在四十岁出头开始了他的工作。

en: He fell out with his wife.
He showed me the manuscript of his new play.
zh: 他给我看了他的新剧本的手稿。

en: He is content with his present state.
zh: 他对现在的状态感到满意。

en: He is addressed as "Doctor" in his laboratory.
zh: 在实验室里，人们称呼他为“博士”。

en: He made up his mind to keep his plan secret.
zh: 他下定决心要保守他的计划秘密。

en: I believed him to be in good health.
He made the most of his opportunity.
zh: 他充分利用了他的机会。

en: He helps whoever asks him to help.
zh: 谁向他求助，他就帮助谁。

en: He was cured of his drinking habit.
He always takes advantage of the mistakes made by his rivals.
zh: 他总是利用竞争对手犯的错误。

en: He is no less wise than his brother is.
He had three servants to wait on him.
Is this picture of his own painting?
zh: 这张照片是他自己画的吗？

en: Is this a picture that he drew by himself?
He was denounced as a coward.
He devoted the last years of his life to writing his autobiography.
zh: 他把生命的最后几年献给了自传的写作。

en: He behaved in a cheap manner.
He was accompanied by his wife at the dinner party.
zh: 他参加晚宴时，他的妻子陪同。

en: He acquired education late in his life.
He answers to the description of the criminal.
zh: 他的外貌符合罪犯的描述。

en: He is a partner in crime.
He was innocent of the crime.
It seems that he has been at the scene of the crime.
zh: 他似乎在犯罪现场出现过。

en: He was believed to have committed the crime.
He repented and confessed his crime.
zh: 他忏悔并坦白了他的罪行。

en: He realized the magnitude of his crime.
zh: 他意识到了他罪行的严重性。

en: He upped one end of the plank.
He drove a nail into the board.
zh: 他把钉子钉进了木板里。

en: He is intolerant of opposition.
He was tempted to retort, but thought better of it.
zh: 他本想反驳，但后来觉得还是算了。

en: He dropped out half way into the race.
He is paralyzed down one side.
He walked two miles in half an hour.
He lacks judgement.
He erred in his judgement.
He is accurate in his judgement.
He is as grave as a judge.
He is out and away the best jockey.
He is more lucky than clever.
zh: 他更多的是靠运气，而不是靠聪明。

en: He has eyes at the back of his head.
zh: 他耳听八方/他背后也长了眼睛。

en: He forestalled everybody in accomplishing.
zh: 他抢在所有人之前完成了。

en: He tiptoed into the room.
zh: 他踮着脚尖走进了房间。

en: He was decreed to pay the fine.
He didn't like to be punished.
He will be punished.
He was rightly punished.
He has long hair and wears jeans.
zh: 他留着长发，穿着牛仔裤。

en: He had his hair cut.
It cost him 3,000 yen to get a haircut.
He wept tearing his hair.
He wears his hair long.
He had his hair cut short.
He is beginning to lose his hair.
He fired but missed.
He watched for an opportunity to speak.
He's everybody's friend.
He put on his undershirt inside out.
He is a friendly person.
He carried the box upstairs.
He emptied the box of its contents.
zh: 他把箱子里的东西倒空了。

en: He discovered how to open the box.
zh: 他发现了如何打开箱子。

en: He put some coins in the box.
zh: 他往箱子里放了一些硬币。

en: He will come into a large fortune.
zh: 他将会继承一大笔财产。

en: He is possessed of a great fortune.
He inherited a great fortune.
He will avenge the people on their oppressor.
zh: 他将为人民向压迫者复仇。

en: He received much applause.
He received cheers and applause.
He asked me the way to the museum.
His doctoral thesis must be submitted to the professor by the end of the month.
zh: 他的博士论文必须在这个月底前交给教授。

en: He promised to sell.
He is afraid of getting lung cancer.
He is very ill with pneumonia.
He's got lung cancer.
He was operated on for lung cancer.
He has a habit of scratching his back and biting his nails.
zh: 他有挠背和咬指甲的习惯。

en: He died of lung cancer.
He can swim on his back.
He was sitting up straight.
He bit off more than he could chew.
zh: 他做事超出自己的能力。

en: He felt a pain in his back.
He stood with his back to the wall.
He bent his back.
He is short, but strong.
He is short but strong.
He is short, but good at basketball.
zh: 他个子矮，但是擅长篮球。

en: He stopped a tall man and asked him the way to the record shop.
zh: 他拦住了一个高个子男人，问他去唱片店的路。

en: He would call to his horse as he climbed into his seat.
zh: 他一边爬上座位，一边呼唤他的马。

en: He was too short to get at the grapes.
zh: 他个子太矮，够不着葡萄。

en: He is too short to get at the book on the shelf.
zh: 他个子太矮，够不着架子上的书。

en: He is short, but he is strong.
zh: 他个子矮，但是他很强壮。

en: He is too tall to stand straight in this room.
zh: 他太高了，在这个房间里站不直。

en: He's too tall to stand up straight in this room.
zh: 他太高了，在这房间里站不直。

en: He is a tall and strongly built man.
He is tall and strong.
He is tall and lean.
He is tall, fat and always busy.
zh: 他又高又胖，而且总是很忙。

en: Is he tall?
He is tall, and she is tall too.
You can easily identify him because he is very tall.
zh: 你很容易认出他，因为他个子很高。

en: He is tall, but his brother is much taller.
zh: 他个子很高，但他弟弟比他高得多。

en: He hid in an abandoned building.
zh: 他躲在一栋废弃的建筑物里。

en: He has a great admiration for actor Olivier.
zh: 他非常钦佩演员奥利维尔。

en: He ought to have been an actor.
He is an actor.
He is no better than a fool.
He is no fool.
He is not stupid.
He's not stupid.
He likes all animals except horses.
zh: 他喜欢所有的动物，除了马。

en: He urged his horse along.
He raises horses and cattle.
He was tying his horse to the fence.
zh: 他当时正把他的马拴在栅栏上。

en: He is a good judge of horses.
He handles horses well.
He looks like a horse.
He likes to get on the horse and go out.
He likes to go out on horseback.
He jumped his horse over the fence.
He got in the boat with the horse.
He fell off the horse.
He is bankrupt.
It is rumored that he gone bankrupt.
He prevailed on the farmers to try the new seeds.
zh: 他说服农民尝试新的种子。

en: He had no money to buy the farm.
He regretted that he had succeeded to the farm.
He was strong enough to help his father on the farm.
zh: 他身体强壮，足以帮助他父亲在农场干活。

en: He is employed on the farm.
He is breeding cattle on his farm.
zh: 他在他的农场里饲养牛。

en: He went to a college of agriculture.
He is studying agriculture.
He engaged in agriculture.
He looked into the farmer's smiling red face, "Yes, sir." He said.
zh: 他看着农民红润的笑脸，说：“是的，先生。”

en: He realized a large sum by the sale of the plantation.
zh: 他通过出售种植园获得了一大笔钱。

en: He owed his success to both ability and industry.
zh: 他的成功归功于能力和勤奋。

en: He drank too much strong green tea.
zh: 他喝了太多浓烈的绿茶。

en: He made a clean breast of his troubles to her.
zh: 他向她坦白了他的所有烦恼。

en: He hardened clay by putting it into a fire.
zh: 他把粘土放入火中使其硬化。

en: He formed the clay into a bowl.
He has a spirit of tenacity.
zh: 他有一种坚韧不拔的精神。

en: He shaped the statue from clay.
He was too old to swim.
He realized his wishes.
He grew old.
He acts his age.
zh: 他的行为举止符合他的年龄。

en: He lied about his age.
He was excused by reason of his age.
He is a tall boy for his years.
zh: 就他的年龄而言，他是个高个子男孩。

en: He waits on an old lady.
He always indulges in smoking.
He says what he has to say unreservedly to his seniors.
zh: 他毫不保留地对他的长辈说出他想说的话。

en: He was granted a pension.
Instead of relying on a pension, he resolved to apply for the job.
zh: 他没有依赖养老金，而是决定申请这份工作。

en: He made a show of helping the old man.
zh: 他装模作样地帮助那位老人。

en: Though he is old, he is still equal to the task.
zh: 虽然他年纪大了，但他仍然能胜任这项任务。

en: As he grew older, he became more obstinate.
zh: 随着年龄的增长，他变得越来越固执。

en: The older he got, the more famous he became.
He was too old to work any more.
zh: 他太老了，不能再工作了。

en: He has outlived his fame.
He is getting old, but he is as healthy as ever.
zh: 他年纪越来越大，但仍然像以往一样健康。

en: He could not live out the year.
As he grew older, he became gentler.
zh: 随着年龄的增长，他变得更加温和。

en: The older he grew, the more modest he became.
He is too old.
He is too old to try it.
Since he is old, this task must be difficult for him.
zh: 因为他年纪大了，这项任务对他来说一定很困难。

en: Though he is old, he is very healthy.
zh: 虽然他年纪大了，但他非常健康。

en: He is old, but at all events he works well.
zh: 他年纪大了，但无论如何他工作得很好。

en: He is old.
He is old, but he's worn well.
zh: 他年纪大了，但他保养得很好。

en: Old as he is, he is very healthy and active.
zh: 他虽然年纪大了，但非常健康有活力。

en: Though he is old, he has a youthful spirit.
zh: 他虽然年纪大了，却有一颗年轻的心。

en: He looks so young for his age that he passes for a college student.
zh: 他看起来比实际年龄年轻很多，以至于看起来像个大学生。

en: He looks young for his age.
zh: 他看起来比实际年龄年轻。

en: He looks young considering his age.
zh: 考虑到他的年龄，他看起来很年轻。

en: He runs well for his age.
zh: 以他的年龄来说，他跑得很快。

en: He's quite active for his age.
zh: 以他的年龄来说，他相当活跃。

en: He looks quite sophisticated for his age.
zh: 以他的年龄来说，他看起来很成熟。

en: He has good judgement for his age.
zh: 以他的年龄来说，他很有判断力。

en: Age deprived him of his sight.
He became wiser as he grew older.
zh: 他随着年龄的增长变得更聪明了。

en: He is too old to walk quickly.
He complained that his age was beginning to tell on him.
zh: 他抱怨说他的年龄开始对他产生影响了。

en: Young as he is, he is equal to the task.
zh: 他虽然年轻，但能胜任这项任务。

en: He is an ardent music lover.
zh: 他是一位热情的音乐爱好者。

en: He is raising tropical fishes.
He has to study hard.
He studied hard, which enabled him to pass the exam.
zh: 他努力学习，这使他能够通过考试。

en: He is working intently.
zh: 他正在专心致志地工作。

en: He studied Japanese eagerly.
He went to Atami for a change of air.
He was borne away by passion.
He did it with great zeal.
He is alive with enthusiasm.
He couldn't bear the heat.
He burnt his hand on the hot stove.
zh: 他在热炉子上烫伤了手。

en: He sipped the hot coffee slowly.
zh: 他慢慢地啜饮着热咖啡。

en: He scalded his tongue with the hot tea.
He keeps two cats: one is black, and the other white.
zh: 他养了两只猫：一只是黑色的，另一只是白色的。

en: He keeps a cat.
He has a cat.
He took delight in teasing the kitten.
He does not like cats.
He dried his wet clothes by the fire.
zh: 他在火边烘干了湿衣服。

en: He accomplished his mission.
He bathed and dressed.
He had a good look at the papers.
He is working hard in order to pass the entrance examination.
zh: 他正在努力学习，以便通过入学考试。

en: He's studying hard so he can pass the entrance exam.
zh: 他努力学习，这样他才能通过入学考试。

en: He couldn't pass the entrance examination.
He boasted of having passed the entrance exam.
zh: 他吹嘘自己通过了入学考试。

en: He's likely to pass the entrance examination.
zh: 他很可能通过入学考试。

en: He will sit for the entrance examination.
zh: 他将参加（或参加）入学考试。

en: He is busy preparing for the entrance examination.
zh: 他正忙着准备入学考试。

en: He blamed his teacher for his failure in the entrance examination.
zh: 他把入学考试失败归咎于他的老师。

en: He failed the entrance exam.
He passed the entrance examination.
He visited a sick friend who was in the hospital.
zh: 他去医院探望了一个生病的朋友。

en: He went to see her in hospital every other day.
zh: 他每隔一天就去医院看她。

en: He went to see her in the hospital every other day.
zh: 他每隔一天就去医院看她。

en: He is in hospital.
He's in the hospital.
Though he had been in the hospital, he kept up with other students.
zh: 虽然他住院了，但他仍然跟得上其他学生。

en: From the moment he arrived there, he kept on bothering his doctor to tell him when he would be able to go home.
zh: 从他到达那里起，他就一直缠着医生，让他告诉他什么时候可以回家。

en: He took off his cap in front of the entrance.
zh: 他在入口前摘下了帽子。

en: He said he would not come in, but he came in after all.
zh: 他说他不会进来，但最终还是进来了。

en: He closed the door quietly behind him.
zh: 他轻轻地关上了身后的门。

en: He works every day except Sunday.
zh: 除了星期天，他每天都工作。

en: Excepting Sundays he works every day.
zh: 除了星期天，他每天都工作。

en: He works every day save Sundays.
zh: 除了星期天，他每天都工作。

en: He cleaned his room on Sunday.
zh: 他星期天打扫了他的房间。

en: He comes here without fail on Sunday.
zh: 他每个星期天都准时来这里。

en: He intends to visit the farm on Sunday.
zh: 他打算星期天去农场参观。

en: He made a kennel along with his son on Sunday.
zh: 他星期天和他的儿子一起做了一个狗窝。

en: He built a doghouse with his son on Sunday.
zh: 他星期天和他的儿子一起建了一个狗屋。

en: He used to come to see me on Sunday.
zh: 他过去常常在星期天来看我。

en: He used to come here for a talk on Sundays.
zh: 他过去常常在星期天来这里聊天。

en: He used to go to the museum on Sunday.
zh: 他过去常常在星期天去博物馆。

en: He rarely stays home on Sunday.
zh: 他很少在星期天待在家里。

en: He seldom stays home on Sundays.
zh: 他很少在星期天待在家里。

en: He's not always at home on Sundays.
zh: 他并不总是在星期天待在家里。

en: He's always at home on Sundays.
zh: 他总是在星期天待在家里。

en: He plays golf every Sunday.
zh: 他每个星期天都打高尔夫球。

en: As a do-it-yourselfer, he made a doghouse.
zh: 作为一个自己动手的人，他做了一个狗窝。

en: He works every day but Sunday.
zh: 他每天都工作，除了星期天。

en: He had to work even on Sunday.
zh: 他甚至在星期天也要工作。

en: He has been ill ever since Sunday.
zh: 自从星期天以来，他就一直生病。

en: He worked day and night and overworked himself.
He appreciates Japanese culture.
He went about from town to town while he was in Japan.
zh: 他在日本的时候，走遍了一个又一个城镇。

en: He has a Japanese car.
He is not Japanese.
He is one of the business leaders in Japan.
zh: 他是日本的商业领袖之一。

en: He got well acquainted with the history of Japan.
zh: 他对日本的历史非常熟悉。

en: He is able to speak Japanese.
He can speak Japanese.
He's able to speak Japanese.
He always wanted to study Japanese.
He is staying here with a view to learning Japanese.
zh: 他住在这里是为了学习日语。

en: He speaks Japanese as if he were Japanese.
zh: 他说日语说得好像他是日本人一样。

en: He speaks Japanese very well.
He teaches them how to speak Japanese.
He has only a superficial knowledge of Japanese.
zh: 他对日语只有肤浅的了解。

en: He's very much interested in the Japanese language.
He has a great interest in Japanese.
zh: 他对日本有很大的兴趣。

en: He's very interested in Japanese.
He can speak both Japanese and English with facility.
zh: 他能流利地说日语和英语。

en: Can he speak Japanese?
He was greatly instrumental in making Japan understood.
zh: 他在使人们了解日本方面起了很大的作用。

en: He represented Japan at a conference.
zh: 他代表日本出席了一个会议。

en: He went to India by way of Japan.
He left Japan never to come back.
zh: 他离开了日本，一去不复返。

en: He left Japan for America.
He is very much interested in Japanese history. We are surprised at his vast knowledge of the subject.
zh: 他对日本历史非常感兴趣。我们惊讶于他对这个主题的渊博知识。

en: He is very much interested in Japanese history.
zh: 他对日本历史非常感兴趣。

en: He compiled a Japanese folklore anthology for use in schools.
zh: 他编写了一本日本民间故事选集，供学校使用。

en: He is familiar with Japanese culture.
He has a good knowledge of the internal affairs of Japan.
zh: 他对日本的内政有很好的了解。

en: He is a Japanese boy.
He translated a Japanese novel into French.
zh: 他把一本日本小说翻译成了法语。

en: He has a good knowledge of Japanese religion.
zh: 他对日本宗教有很好的了解。

en: He wrote on the social evolution of Japan.
zh: 他写了关于日本社会演变的文章。

en: He is quite ignorant of things Japanese.
zh: 他对日本的事情一无所知。

en: He is one of the greatest artists in Japan.
zh: 他是日本最伟大的艺术家之一。

en: He has a good acquaintance with Japanese theater.
He has been regarded as Japan's answer to Picasso.
zh: 他被认为是日本的毕加索。

en: I thought that he knew everything about Japan.
zh: 我以为他了解日本的一切。

en: He is an Edison in Japan.
The longer he stays in Japan, the better his Japanese gets.
zh: 他在日本待的时间越长，他的日语就越好。

en: He went back to Japan.
He doesn't know much about Japan.
He doesn't know a lot about Japan.
He's a famous popular singer in Japan.
zh: 他是日本一位很有名的流行歌手。

en: He hopes to exhibit his paintings in Japan.
zh: 他希望在日本展出他的画作。

en: He is one of the greatest scientists in Japan.
zh: 他是日本最伟大的科学家之一。

en: Is he loved in Japan?
He is also very famous in Japan.
He is one of the most famous singers in Japan.
zh: 他是日本最著名的歌手之一。

en: He is a famous composer.
zh: 他是一位著名的作曲家。

en: He decided not to use much energy in his daily life.
zh: 他决定在日常生活中尽量节约能源。

en: He saturated himself with sunshine.
zh: 他让自己沐浴在阳光下。

en: He is of Japanese ancestry.
He rose from day laborer to governor.
zh: 他从一个日工变成了州长。

en: He was employed by the day.
He keeps a diary.
He told his diary that she had come to see him.
zh: 他在日记里写道她来看他了。

en: He went on a one-day trip.
He studied ten hours a day on average.
zh: 他平均每天学习十个小时。

en: He studies ten hours a day on average.
zh: 他平均每天学习十个小时。

en: He prays several times a day.
He earns no less than three hundred dollars a day.
zh: 他每天至少赚三百美元。

en: He is getting better day by day.
He attained the top of the mountain before dark.
zh: 他在天黑前到达了山顶。

en: He never goes out after dark.
He arrived there after dark.
He suits a ballplayer mentally, too, physically, too.
zh: 他在精神上和身体上都很适合当一名棒球运动员。

en: He has endured physical and mental pain.
zh: 他忍受了身心上的痛苦。
